author: newsr.in
title: Matt Damon Opens Up About Ben Affleck's Relationship With Jennifer Lopez for 'THR' Cover
text: Matt Damon heads to work out at his local gym with wife Luciana on Wednesday (September 30) in West Hollywood, Calif. The 44-year-old Martian star appears on the latest cover of THR where he opens up about his best friend, Ben Affleck. “There’s nobody who’s more misunderstood,” Matt said. “Ten years ago, the public image [...] »
